subject: Baseball

Playoff Games
Weather
Appointments and Executive Changes
lead_paragraph: Games were rained out in Baltimore, Pittsburgh and Cleveland, forcing three doubleheaders Wednesday and holding up the Blue Jays, the Cardinals, the Pirates, the Twins and the Indians.
snippet: Games were rained out in Baltimore, Pittsburgh and Cleveland, forcing three doubleheaders Wednesday and holding up the Blue Jays, the Cardinals, the Pirates, the Twins and the Indians.
